title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 513/93 of 5 March 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 19/82 laying down detailed rules for applying Council Regulation (EEC) No 2641/80 with regard to imports of sheepmeat and goatmeat products originating in certain non-member countries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 513/93 of 5 March 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 19/82 laying down detailed rules for applying Council Regulation (EEC) No 2641/80 with regard to imports of sheepmeat and goatmeat products originating in certain  non-member countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Point XII of Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 19/82 is hereby replaced by the following:
1. 'XII. "Ministry of Industry and Trade" for the Czech Republic'.
The following point is hereby inserted in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 19/82:
2. 'XIII. "Ministry of Economy" for the Slovak Republic'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 275, 18. 10. 1980, p. 2.
(2) OJ No L 391, 31. 12. 1992, p. 51.
(3) OJ No L 3, 7. 1. 1982, p. 18.
(4) OJ No L 89, 4. 4. 1992, p. 19.
